## 

```{r}
orderData = read.csv('./order.csv', header=T)
head(orderData)

```

## list top 100 customers
```{r}
uniqueCustomers <- unique(orderData$Customer.ID)
length(uniqueCustomers)
ordersByCustomer <- (table(orderData$Customer.ID))
top100Cust = head(sort(ordersByCustomer, decreasing = T), n=100)
customers = list(names(top100Cust))

```
